entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Escoumins
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of drizzle. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle late in the morning. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
